幕の内: (まくのうち) - box lunch (containing rice and 10-15 small portions of fish, meat, and vegetables); {sumo}  highest-ranking division; intermission (between acts)/interlude
幕の内弁当: (まくのうちべんとう) - box lunch (containing rice and 10-15 small portions of fish, meat, and vegetables)
幕を切って落とす: (まくをきっておとす) - to start (e.g. a scene, a war, etc.)
幕を切る: (まくをきる) - to start (e.g. a scene, a war, etc.); to end (e.g. a play, an episode, an event, etc.)
幕を引く: (まくをひく) - to draw closed the curtain (of a theatre, etc.); to come to an end
幕を閉じる: (まくをとじる) - to come to an end; to close the curtain
幕下: (まくした) - {sumo} third highest division; wrestlers of the third highest division
幕下上位: (まくしたじょうい) - {sumo} 30 highest ranked makushita wrestlers
幕下付け出し: (まくしたつけだし) - {sumo}  very successful amateur wrestler, allowed to start professional career in makushita division
幕下付出し: (まくしたつけだし) - {sumo}  very successful amateur wrestler, allowed to start professional career in makushita division
幕下格: (まくしたかく) - {sumo} referee officiating the third highest division
幕僚長: (ばくりょうちょう) - chief of staff
幕内十年: (まくうちじゅうねん) - {sumo} 10 year career in the highest division is enough for anyone
幕内最高優勝: (まくうちさいこうゆうしょう) - {sumo} tournament win in the highest division
幕内格: (まくうちかく) - {sumo} referee officiating at bouts of rank-and-file wrestlers in the highest division
幕切れ: (まくぎれ) - fall of the curtain; last scene; end of act
幕尻: (まくじり) - {sumo} lowest ranked wrestler in makuuchi division
幕屋: (まくや) - tent; tabernacle; small curtain-enclosed area (off a stage); Makuya (Original Gospel Movement of Japan)
幕引き: (まくひき) - putting an end to
幕明き: (まくあき) - the rise of the curtain/opening (of play); beginning (e.g. of an era)/opening (festival, event, etc.)
幕明け: (まくあけ) - the rise of the curtain/opening (of play); beginning (e.g. of an era)/opening (festival, event, etc.)
幕末: (ばくまつ) - closing days of the Tokugawa shogunate; end of Edo era
幕臣: (ばくしん) - shogunate retainer or vassal
幕藩体制: (ばくはんたいせい) - the feudal system characteristic of the shogunate
幕開: (まくあき) - the rise of the curtain/opening (of play); beginning (e.g. of an era)/opening (festival, event, etc.)
幕開き: (まくあき) - the rise of the curtain/opening (of play); beginning (e.g. of an era)/opening (festival, event, etc.)
幕開け: (まくあけ) - the rise of the curtain/opening (of play); beginning (e.g. of an era)/opening (festival, event, etc.)
幡幢: (はたぼこ) - long-handled Chinese spear bearing a small flag; (どう only) banner/hanging
幢幡: (どうばん) - hanging-banner used as ornament in Buddhist temples
幣: (hei) - dinheiro, equipe com serpentinas de papel trançado
幣を奉る: (ぬさをたてまつる) - to offer a wand with hemp and paper streamers to a Shinto god
幣串: (へいぐし) - staff to which shide are attached to make a go-hei
幣束: (へいそく) - offerings of rope, paper, etc. hung on trees in Shinto shrines
幣殿: (へいでん) - hall of offerings (at a shrine)
幣物: (へいもつ) - Shinto offerings; present to a guest
幣辛夷: (しでこぶし) - Magnolia praecocissima; shidekobushi Magnolia kobus
干からびる: (ひからびる) - to dry up completely; to become stale
干し固める: (ほしかためる) - to dry until stiff
干し物: (ほしもの) - things dried in the sun (esp. clothes, dyed cloth, etc.)
干し芋: (ほしいも) - dried sweet potato; satsuma sweet potato steamed, sliced and dried
干し草の山: (ほしくさのやま) - haystack; hay bale
干し草を付けた馬: (ほしくさをつけたうま) - horse loaded with hay
干し菜: (ほしな) - dried leaves (esp. of daikon and turnip)
干し薯: (ほしいも) - dried sweet potato; satsuma sweet potato steamed, sliced and dried
干し藷: (ほしいも) - dried sweet potato; satsuma sweet potato steamed, sliced and dried
干し飯: (ほしいい) - dried boiled rice used mainly as provisions of samurai troops and travelers (travellers)
干す: (ほす) - to air/to dry/to desiccate; to drain (off); to drink up; to deprive of a role, job, etc. (usu. in the passive)
干ばつ: (かんばつ) - drought; long spell (period) of dry weather
干上がる: (ひあがる) - to dry up; to parch; to ebb away
干与: (かんよ) - participation; taking part in; participating in; being concerned in
干乾びる: (ひからびる) - to dry up completely; to become stale
干割れる: (ひわれる) - to dry out and crack
干天慈雨: (かんてんじう) - (yoji) welcome (beneficial) rain in a drought; realization of something eagerly looked for; a welcome relief
干害: (かんがい) - drought disaster; drought damage
干戈: (かんか) - shield and halberd; fighting; war
干戈を交える: (かんかをまじえる) - to open hostilities; to be at war
干支: (かんし) - sexagenary cycle (60-year cycle of 12 animal zodiac and 5 elements in Chinese astrology); 12-year Chinese zodiac
干枯びる: (ひからびる) - to dry up completely; to become stale
干枯らびる: (ひからびる) - to dry up completely; to become stale
